As a general rule, you should 
be able to hold a conversation 
as you exercise. If you become 
breathless as you talk, then 
you are probably exercising too 
strenuously.
It is recommended you should 
do 150 minutes of 
physical activity spread 
throughout the week 
in pregnancy. If you 
were inactive before 
you were pregnant,
